thread.title: Petersburg High School: Memorial tribute planned for alumnus Moses Malone Saturday
thread.title_full: Petersburg High School: Memorial tribute planned for alumnus Moses Malone Saturday

author: Contributed Report
title: Petersburg High School: Memorial tribute planned for alumnus Moses Malone Saturday
text: Petersburg High School: Memorial tribute planned for alumnus Moses Malone Saturday Comment By Contributed Report Posted Oct. 24, 2015 @ 2:01 am PETERSBURG â€“ Petersburg High School alumni and basketball legend, Moses Malone, passed away suddenly on September 13, 2015 in Norfolk, VA at age 60. Moses Malone graduated Petersburg High School in 1974 as the first basketball player to play for a national basketball team right out of high school. A funeral service was held on Monday, September 19, 2015 in Houston, Texas. Petersburg High School Athletic Department in collaboration with the City of Petersburg is plans to hold a memorial tribute in Petersburg High School gymnasium today where the entire community can celebrate the life and legacy of Moses Malone. Tribute Date: Saturday, October 24, 2015, 1 p.m., Location: Petersburg High School Gymnasium, 3101 Johnson Rd., Petersburg The tribute event is free to the public and no tickets or reservations are required to attend. For more coverage on the tribute, see the Sunday, Oct. 25 edition of The Progress-Index or go online at www.progress-index.com .
